structure.unit: ARTICLE CXLIX. DADE-MIAMI CRIMINAL JUSTICE COUNCIL

law.catch_line: Applicability of State and County Laws.

text.section: The Council shall be regulated by the Standards for Creation and Review of Boards Generally Ordinance (Sections et seq. of the Code of Miami-Dade County), Chapter 286 of the Florida Statutes (the "Sunshine Law") and Chapter 119 of the Florida Statutes (the "Public Records Law"). Notwithstanding any provision of et seq., or any other ordinance, no Institutional member or Institutional member's designee shall be required to be a Miami-Dade County resident. Members of the Council, or their designees, may sit on no more than two County advisory boards, unless otherwise required or permitted by law.
